resources.string: "You wake up, hung-over, telling yourself for the hundreth time that you'll never drink again. An obvious lie."
Strange. You see that you have 19 missed calls and the whole network is down.
"Go to the bathroom to get water."
"It looks like there's a sick person on the floor of the hallway."
"You hear sirens outside. Check the window.
"The zombie gets up and eats your brains out! You are dead!"
"There's an overturned ambulance with sickly looking people walking aimlessly around the streets. Blood and guts everywhere."
"Look around the room and get what you need."
"There's got to be something important to take before leaving."
"Time to kick zombie butt! (And hopefully survive)."
"Suck it! That was a close one. Now the laptop is broken so you set it aside. No sense carrying extra weight."
"Better check on Tom. See if he's alright."
"Tom is a zombie! He tries to attack."
"What has the world come to? What is happening? My best friends are attacking me. I need to get out of here."
"Zombies come flowing out of the elevator. There might be too many for you."
"You find a master key. Better take it, you never know."
"You hear your friend Joyce scream, from inside the study lounge."
"You panic and run outside. However, a hoard of zombies overcomes you."
"You are not a sissy. Kill them all!"
"Go back to the start of the game."
"Tom didn't look very happy to see you"
"The zombies had an all-you-can-eat buffet on your brains."
"That's what you get for being too slow."
"The key fit perfectly in the lock. You see a zombie headed towards Joyce."
"Try out the key you found earlier"
"Run outside and look for another way in to save her"
"You do your best, but it's futile without a weapon."
"You're not a sissy. Kill them all!"
"There were too many and you were overwhelmed. Too bad."
"You save Joyce and she joins the team! She tells you that she was with your mutual friends Sean, Jose and Harish, but got separated from them on the way to the dining hall to look for supplies."
"Head towards the dining hall to look for the others."
"You walk by a radio and stop for a second to listen. There is an announcement about a worldwide virus pandemic that is spreading and causing the infected to become cannibals."

" In other news, NASA is planning to colonize Mars with never-before-heard-of-technology. It cuts off right before announcing the location where the rocket will launch from. You ponder what this could mean as you realize that the game has temporarily come to an end. That's right, we've arrived at the dreaded: TO BE CONTINUED"
